column1: Under what conditions is an object's finalize() method invoked by the garbage collector?;When it detects that the object has become unreachable.
column2: As soon as object is set as null.
column3: At fixed intervalm it checks for null value.
column4: None of the above.;When it detects that the object has become unreachable.

column1: What is a transient variable?;A transient variable is a variable which is serialized during Serialization.
column2: A transient variable is a variable that may not be serialized during Serialization.
column3: A transient variable is a variable which is to be marked as serializable.
column4: None of the above.;A transient variable is a variable that may not be serialized during Serialization.

column1: What is inheritance?;It is the process where one object acquires the properties of another.
column2: inheritance is the ability of an object to take on many forms.
column3: inheritance is a technique to define different methods of same type.
column4: None of the above.;It is the process where one object acquires the properties of another.

column1: What is polymorphism?;Polymorphism is a technique to define different objects of same type.
column2: Polymorphism is the ability of an object to take on many forms.
column3: Polymorphism is a technique to define different methods of same type.
column4: None of the above.;None of the above.

column1: What of the following is the default value of an instance variable?;null
column3: Depends upon the type of variable
column4: Not assigned;Depends upon the type of variable
